title: The Secret Ingredient
location: Market Ward -> The Culinary College Hall
description: The annual Bread Competition is rocked by scandal: the winning loaf has an unidentifiable ingredient causing judges to grin uncontrollably. Runner-up baker Oswin alleges winner Petra used illegal alchemy. The prize is 500 gold and the title of City Baker.

turns.narrative: The winning loaf sits on a velvet cushion — golden and perfect but with an iridescent sheen along its crust. Judge Sella has eaten three slices and cannot stop grinning.
turns.choice_a: Taste a small piece and assess the effect
turns.consequence_a: An extraordinary wave of contentment settles over you — deep and pleasant but clearly unnatural. You feel no desire to argue with anyone.
turns.choice_b: Examine the bread under alchemical light
turns.consequence_b: Small crystalline particles are visible in the crumb — too fine for flour, too regular for impurity.

turns.narrative: Petra admits she accidentally used ancestral 'old honey' from her grandmother — a very diluted Mirthbloom extract her family has used for three generations as a secret spice. She had no idea it was alchemically active.
turns.consequence_a: Petra is disqualified despite innocence. Oswin wins by default but feels hollow.
turns.choice_b: Recommend Sella declare a tie since the ingredient was used in innocent good faith
turns.consequence_b: Sella agrees. Both share the title and split the prize. Both are grudgingly satisfied.

turns.narrative: The ancestral honey tin is now a matter of record and public interest.
turns.choice_a: Ensure the honey tin is documented with the City Alchemists
turns.consequence_a: It is properly categorised — mildly regulated but not banned.
turns.choice_b: Suggest Petra keep the tin private and stop using it in competition
turns.consequence_b: Petra agrees. The tin stays in her family. The Ward is none the wiser.

honey_private.description: Honey kept private. No formal registration.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.
